p: We used leaves of Azin or barg-e-neem and Lain or barg-e-hena, whole plant of Fuin or shahtra, and flowers of Spin or gul mundi for extraction. The herbal extract formulation was prepared at Faculty of Eastern Medicine, Hamdard University, Karachi. Herbs were washed, dried in air, and processed by continuous extractions. Azin, Fuin, Spin and Lain were analyzed by the basic quality control according to Herbal Pharmacopoeia. These herbs were mixed in ratio of 1:1:1:1, respectively and extracted in 95% ethanol for 7 days at room temperature. Then, this extract solution was subjected into rotary evaporator, and it was freeze-dried to remove the solvent. Finally, the extract of the formulation was sterilized at 20Â°C.
